constituent: wretched, Freud, state of mind, nonplussed, visit, elbow, large, St. Bernard, shape
koohiiStory1: Whenever I have to visit the relatives... that puts me in one hell of a wretched state of mind.
koohiiStory2: Data feels wretched because he has no family to visit.
readingExamples: 惨劇 (さんげき), 悲惨 (ひさん), 陰惨 (いんさん), 惨め (みじ.め)
